tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE food_and_wine_pairings (
  food_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  food_name TEXT,
  wine_id INT,
  wine_name TEXT,
  pairing_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE food (
  food_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  food_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  cuisine_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE wine (
  wine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  wine_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  grape_variety VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE pairing (
  pairing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  food_id INT NOT NULL,
  wine_id INT NOT NULL,
  pairing_notes VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE review (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  pairing_id INT NOT NULL,
  rating INT,
  review_text TEXT
)
